ovdesc.p: This application contains, by Portfolio and Security, any active blocks that have been placed by the SC.BLOCK.SEC.POS application for the US Market. Whenever a BLOCK is placed on a security position, this application will be updated with the ID of the block that was placed.

If a BLOCK is to be removed, this application will be used to verify and display to the user what blocks currently exist for that security position. Once the user has selected the block to be removed, the ID of the block will be removed from this application.

desc.p: Consists of 2 values that identify the SECURITY.POSITION being blocked and the reason for the block.
The ID of the SECURITY.POSITION being blocked is the same as the REFERENCE.NUMBER of the SECURITY.POSITION. Please refer to the Helptext for the REFERENCE.NUMBER field of the SECURITY.POSITION
A value to indicate the type of block
a. If this field is blank, the block is being placed because the security is being used for collateral against bank borrowings
b. If this field has the word OTHER, the block is being place for a non-collateral reason
Indicates the ID of the SC.BLOCK.SEC.POS application of a block that is currently active on the system.
